channel.title: {317} how to get a ::restart command
channel.description: Ok, so i have a command in my server named ::restart.. but it doesn't work correct. it just kicks everyone. and freezes the server. Can someone help get me a real ::restart command (I can convert it if needed) and can someone also get me a resetnpc command? thanks

item.title: {317} how to get a ::restart command
item.dc:creator: @jmk600 jmk600
item.description:
@jmk600 wrote:

You can just use ::update 5 (5 seconds). It restarts it. but you have to restart your server.bat

Read full topic
